name: THIKPO Universal Fuel Injector Tester and Cleaner Tool Kit, DIY Cleaning Tool Kit, 8 Pulse Modes, 4 Wire Dual Channel for 2 Fuel Injectors, 8 Size Cleaning Adapters, 12V/5V Output Power
short_description: Upgraded Universal Fuel Injector Tester and Cleaner Tool Kit---Operates injectors individually to diagnose fuel delivery problems on petrol vehicles with electronic fuel injection, such as blockage, leakage, damage, and burnout of the injectors. The included 8-size cleaning adapters combined with the tester pulse mode can quickly clean the injectors

【Test for 2 Injectors Simultaneously & Ultra-long Power Cord】Come with two pairs of output terminals, allowing you to test for two injectors or for one injector at once. The tester power cord is up to 40inch and the test lead is up to 20 inches for convenient testing. The wires are made of superior silica gel, allowing the tester to work at high and low temperatures. （To make it perform better, it is recommended to work at normal temperatures.）

【8 Size Adapters Cleaning Tool & Universal Fit】Our cleaner small and large size adapters are compatible with most 12V EFI and GDI vehicle models' injectors. We also offer two additional specialized adapters for the BMW Audi, one is suitable for models such as V.W, Audi, etc. and another one with threaded hole is exclusively for BMW N series such as N14/N18/N20/N26/N53/N54/N55/N63/S63.

【8 Pulse Modes & LCD Display】The fuel injector tester kit is designed with 8 pulse modes, which are composed of 4 pulse signal output modes and 2 output voltage levels: Short/ Medium/ Long/ Continuous pulse modes + High/Low(12V/5V) power drive modes. This tester has a wide variety of pulse modes, providing a large testing space to accurately and quickly diagnose and repair petrol vehicle injectors' fuel delivery problems. The LCD displays the mode you are in.

【Polarity Reverse Connection Protection & Short Circuit Protection】Deigned with power input reverse connection protection and output short circuit protection function. In the case damaged or a short circuit of the pulse output terminal, the power indicator light of the fuel injector cleaner tool kit will flash to prompt you.

【Power supply method】Powered by a 12V battery or an external DC 12V (at least 1.5A) power adapter. and it can work with any fuel pressure tester(NOTE: Gasoline car only, NOT the diesel engine). Warmly Note: Using this cleaning tool kit to clean requires a cleaner(not included) and a 12V DC battery power supply (not included). Please prepare these necessary tools before your cleaning.

【ADDITIONAL FUNCTION & NOTES】 (1.This injector tester pulse tool can be modified for relay testing or solenoid valve testing, other modifications should be made under the guidance of professionals. (2. The pulse timer can be used in conjunction with the fuel pressure gauge when working off the engine. (3. This fuel injector tester tool can be used with any fuel pressure tester. （4. Not applicable to diesel mechanical fuel injectors

【Professional Services Online & 3-Year Wa-rran-ty】Our technicians and customer support are online to answer your questions to provide professional guidance, and refunds or exchanges without worry. We promise 3 years wa-rran-ty.

name: Royal Purple 18000 Max Atomizer Fuel Injector Cleaner, 6 fl. oz.
short_description: Restores fuel economy
Stabilizes ethanol
Maximizes horsepower
Improves responsiveness
For use in both gasoline and diesel engines
product_description: Royal Purple’s Max-Atomizer is a fully-synthetic, highly concentrated, high performance fuel injector cleaner. It is specially formulated to solve problems with today’s direct injection engines, but can be used with any type of fuel injection. Max-Atomizer contains highly concentrated polyether amine (PEA) detergents that quickly clean clogged and coked injectors, restoring 100% of injector flow. This optimizes injector spray patterns and better atomizes fuel as it enters the combustion chamber. The result is improved fuel economy, enhanced power and performance, reduced emissions, smoother idle, and quicker / easier starts. Max-Atomizer is the only fuel injector cleaner that also stabilizes ethanol, which chemically breaks down to cause harmful effects to an engine.

name: AUTOOL Fuel Injector Cleaner Tester Machine, Ultrasonic Fuel Injection Cleaner with Heating Function 4 Cylinder for GDI, EFI, FSI Fuel Injectors, Digital Display, 3 Cleaning Functions 10 Test Modes
short_description: 【Ultrasonic Heating Cleaning】The fuel injector cleaner machine can be used to clean 4 injectors simultaneously with ultrasonic heating up to 45°C, 28kHz ultrasonic waves penetrate deep into injectors to dissolve stubborn carbon deposits, ensuring thorough cleaning without disassembly. Faster results compared to traditional chemical soaks.

【Comprehensive Injector Testing】9-in-1 diagnostic functions: Test leakage, spray pattern, flow uniformity, and volume under simulated engine conditions (idle, acceleration, high-speed). Includes idle speed test, medium speed test, high speed test, accelerating test, shifting speed test, leakage test, idling spray value test, medium speed spray value test, high speed spray value test.

【Universal Compatibility】Digital pressure control (0–5 bar) and adjustable pulse width (0–20ms) for precise performance analysis. Works with all fuel injector types (including high-pressure direct injection) using interchangeable adapters.

【More Careful Design】Four 100ml thick explosion-proof glass tubes can test and clean four injectors at the same time, ensuring higher efficiency. The test fluid level indication allows you to observe the volume of test fluid at any time to avoid overflow and waste of test fluid. The cleaning liquid discharge valve can discharge the used cleaning liquid, and it is convenient to collect the cleaning liquid for the next injector cleaning, which saves time, labor and money.

【Various Connectors & Storage Drawer】It is equipped with various sizes of injector connectors and accessories to meet different injector installations. A portable drawer at the bottom is designed to store a variety of parts and for easy access. Intelligent digital display not only allows you to select the function and pressure, but also adjust the pulse width, pulse count, and working time.

【Three Years Warranty】For any quality problems. If CT160 has any defect, we will provide new replacement or solutions for our customers until satisfaction without delay, and provides lifetime technical support. For any needs, you are warmly welcomed to contact us and we will get back to you ASAP within 24 hours.

name: 505 CRF Fuel System Treatment - 16 oz Powerful Carbon & Injector Cleaner for Gasoline & Diesel Engines - Help Boost MPG, Restore Power, & Reduce Emissions - Easy Pour Bottle
short_description: A fuel system treatment that actually works!
The 505CRF formula is proven to remove tough carbon deposits on port style injectors, and direct style injectors.
Removes harmful deposits on induction ports, and induction valves.
Treats 5 to 20 gallons of gasoline or diesel fuel.
Helps restore your vehicles factory fuel economy & performance.
A perfect addition to your preventative maintanance needs!
product_description: ATS 505CRF Fuel System Treatment is designed to be added directly to the fuel. Just remove the fuel cap and pour contents into fuel tank. One can of ATS Fuel System Treatment will treat 5 to 20 gallons of gasoline or diesel fuel. ATS Fuel System Treatment enhances gasoline to remove carbon deposits from the internal combustion engine components. This chemical mixture is proven to remove carbon from; fuel injectors, induction ports, induction valves, and combustion chambers. Carbon deposits on the injectors can cause drivability problems and poor fuel mileage. This advanced formula can clean carbonization from the port style injector and the direct style injector; increasing engine performance and fuel economy. It is recommended to use both treatments every other oil change. Do not use more than one bottle of 505CRO per oil change or one bottle of 505CRF per tank of gas. More chemical added is not better. Please follow directions! Warning: Do not mix with other chemicals in oil or fuel Not recommended for aviation engines. *Reminder: This product helps restore your vehicle to factory specifications relating to harmful carbon deposits. Know your vehicles health by seeking a trusted mechanics profesional advice. *Due to regulation clarity we will transitioning to plastic bottles with the same unbeatable carbon dissolving formula!

name: Chevron Techron High Mileage Fuel System Cleaner, 12 oz, Pack of 1
short_description: Restore power and performance - Restores lost power and performance by removing gum, varnish, and other fuel system deposits.
Maximize fuel economy - Keeps engines clean, and protects from deposits that rob engine efficiency and reduce fuel economy.

Protect the fuel system and fuel gauge sensor from various types of corrosion - Multiple corrosion inhibitors protect metal components (both ferrous components like iron and steel, and non-ferrous components like copper and silver) from the damaging effects of corrosion.

Vehicles with higher mileage accumulation can suffer from the effects of age - including carbon build-up and corrosion in the fuel system. Techron High Mileage Fuel System Cleaner helps keep your engine humming, no matter how many roads your vehicle has traveled.
Techron High Mileage Fuel System Cleaner is fully compatible and protective in all commercially available ethanol blends (E10, E85, etc).
product_description: Techron High Mileage Fuel System Cleaner is specially formulated to clean and protect classic cars and all vehicles with over 75, 000 miles. It is formulated for gasoline powered, modern and classic, passenger cars, light trucks, and SUVs, including carbureted, two stroke, and port fuel injected engines. To keep the entire fuel system clean, use Techron High Mileage every 1, 000 miles or as needed for your high mileage vehicle. 1 One 12oz bottle treats up to 21 gallons of gasoline. Recommended for use in: Spark ignition engines with gasoline, ethanol and gasoline/ethanol blends Gasoline hybrid vehicles. Will not harm catalytic converters and oxygen sensors. Not recommended for diesel engines. Not for aviation.

name: PLAYOCCAR V308 Fuel Injector Cleaner Machine,Heated Ultrasonicr Cleaner & Tester Machine,4-Cylinder Fuel System Injection Cleaning Kit with 9 Test Modes for Gasoline & Diesel Car & Motorcycle
short_description: 【Fuel Injector Cleaning&Testing Kit】V308 Fuel Injector Cleaning Machine can clean multiple injectors simultaneously, efficiently removing carbon deposits from fuel injection systems. It also simulates various engine operating conditions and performs comprehensive testing—including leak detection, spray pattern uniformity, and flow rate checks—on up to 4 injectors at once. Compatible with a wide range of automotive and motorcycle fuel injectors.

【Ultrasonic Cleaning & Heating Function】 The V308 Fuel Injector Cleaner Kit emits 50kHz ultrasonic waves for deep cleaning, effectively removing stubborn carbon deposits attached to fuel injectors. The upgraded heated cleaning tank allows you to heat the cleaning fluid up to 50°C by pressing the switch on the side of the machine, ensuring a more thorough clean and restoring the injectors to a like-new condition. Equipped with a large 2000mL cleaning tank, the device supports simultaneous cleaning of multiple fuel injectors, greatly improving cleaning efficiency. (Specialized carbon cleaning fluid is available for separate purchase.)

【11 Core Functions】 The V308 Fuel Injector Cleaner features 11 core functions: Ultrasonic Cleaning; Idle Speed Test; Medium Speed Test; High Speed Test; Acceleration Test; Variable Speed Test; Leakage Test; Idle Spray Volume Detection; Medium Spray Volume Detection; High Spray Volume Detection; and Device Information Inquiry. It can simulate real engine operating conditions, conduct full-condition tests covering idle speed, medium speed, and high speed, measure the corresponding fuel injection volume simultaneously, and perform acceleration, variable speed, and leakage tests. (Medical-grade alcohol or paraffin can be used as the testing fluid.)

【Design Details】V308 fuel injector tester features an LED display with an integrated control panel for quick and intuitive operation. A pressure gauge allows real-time monitoring during tests, while the transparent fluid level indicator ensures no residual liquid remains. The one-touch drain valve enables efficient test fluid recovery for recycling.

【3-Year Warranty】We guarantee free replacement parts for any non-human-caused damage. Our dedicated technical support team is also available to assist with any operational needs. For inquiries or assistance, feel free to contact us anytime.
【Compatibility Notes】 Ultrasonic Cleaning Function: Compatible with almost all gasoline and diesel fuel injectors. Fuel Injector Testing Function: Only compatible with gasoline fuel injectors.
